survey.name: order_add
survey.label: Add-On Order:
survey.hint: Select any that apply.

survey.name: dealer
survey.label: Dealer
survey.hint: Name can be overwritten.

survey.name: customer
survey.label: Customer Name
survey.hint:
Leave blank if new customer.
You can enter contact information on the next page.

survey.name: contactnote
survey.label:
Check customer information for accuracy. If any information
is incorrect, choose 'Add/Edit Contact Info' at the bottom of this page.

survey.name: newcontactinfo
survey.label: Edit contact info?
survey.hint:
Select 'Add/Edit Contact Info' to enter new or additional
information on next page.

survey.name: edits
survey.label: New Customer/Edits:
survey.hint: Enter new contact information below.

survey.name: customer_email
survey.label: Customer Email
survey.constraint message: This isn't a valid email address

survey.name: dlr_address
survey.label: Dealer Address
survey.hint: Overwrite as needed.

survey.name: dlr_city
survey.label: Dealer City
survey.hint: Overwrite as needed.

survey.name: dlr_state
survey.label: Dealer State
survey.hint: Overwrite as needed.

survey.name: dlr_zip
survey.label: Dealer Zip
survey.hint: Overwrite as needed.

survey.name: dlr_phone
survey.label: Dealer Office Phone
survey.hint: Overwrite as needed.

survey.name: dlr_cell
survey.label: Dealer Cell Phone
survey.hint: Overwrite as needed.

survey.name: treatment_note
survey.label:
All seed will be treated with Tri-pak.
Returns allowed up to 12 units or 5% of grower's order -
whichever is greater

survey.name: unitsmp
survey.label: Units Mini-Pellets:
survey.hint: Units must be ordered in multiples of 6 to avoid partial pails.
survey.constraint message: Units must be ordered in multiples of 6 to avoid partial pails.

survey.name: unitsrp
survey.label: Units Regular Pellets:
survey.hint: Units must be ordered in multiples of 4 to avoid partial pails.
survey.constraint message: Units must be ordered in multiples of 4 to avoid partial pails.

survey.name: unitslp
survey.label: Units Large Pellets:
survey.hint: Units must be ordered in multiples of 3 to avoid partial pails.
survey.constraint message: Units must be ordered in multiples of 3 to avoid partial pails.

survey.name: unitsmpmax
survey.label: Units Mini-Pellets (Max Container):
survey.hint: Custom fill. Maximum 72 units each Container

survey.name: unitsrpmax
survey.label: Units Regular Pellets (Max Container):
survey.hint: Custom fill. Maximum 48 units each Container

survey.name: unitslpmax
survey.label: Units Large Pellets (Max container):
survey.hint: Custom fill. Maximum 24 units each Container

survey.name: orig_subtotal
survey.label: Total Cost Per Unit
survey.hint: This number can be edited.
survey.calculation: once(if(${treatment}='Tri-pak',if(${size}='mp' or ${size}='mpmax',345,if(${size}='rp' or ${size}='rpmax',365,if(${size}='lp' or ${size}='lpmax',370,0))),if(${treatment}='Tri-pak_45',if(${size}='mp' or ${size}='mpmax',364,if(${size}='rp' or ${size}='rpmax',384,if(${size}='lp' or ${size}='lpmax',389,0))),if(${treatment}='Premium',if(${size}='mp' or ${size}='mpmax',379,if(${size}='rp' or ${size}='rpmax',399,if(${size}='lp' or ${size}='lpmax',404,0))),if(${treatment}='Premium_45',if(${size}='mp' or ${size}='mpmax',398,if(${size}='rp' or ${size}='rpmax',418,if(${size}='lp' or ${size}='lpmax',423,0))),'')))))

survey.name: price_unit_note
survey.label:
Price per unit:
Reg. Pellet
Premium (NipsIt+Tri-pak+Tach 20) $399
Premium 45 (NipsIt+Tri-pak+Tach 45) $418
Tri-pak  $365
Tri-pak 45 $384

Mini Pellet
Premium (NipsIt+Tri-pak+Tach 20) $379
Premium 45 (NipsIt+Tri-pak+Tach 45) $398
Tri-pak $345
Tri-pak 45 $364


Large Pellet
Premium (NipsIt+Tri-pak+Tach 20) $404
Premium 45 (NipsIt+Tri-pak+Tach 45) $423
Tri-pak $370
Tri-pak 45 $389

survey.name: lot_no
survey.label: Lot Number:
survey.hint: Enter lot number for this order

survey.name: pails
survey.label: Number of pails
survey.hint: # pails calculated based on size & units ordered.
survey.calculation: if(${size}='mp',round(${unitsmp}*.1667,0),if(${size}='rp',round(${unitsrp}*0.25,0),if(${size}='lp',round(${unitslp}*0.3333,0), if(${size}='mpmax', round(${unitsmpmax} div 72,2), if(${size}='rpmax',round(${unitsrpmax} div 48,2), if(${size}='lpmax',round(${unitslpmax} div 24,2),0))))))

survey.name: ret_unitsmp
survey.label: Units Mini-Pellets:
survey.hint: Units must be ordered in multiples of 6 to avoid partial pails.
survey.constraint message: Units must be ordered in multiples of 6 to avoid partial pails.

survey.name: ret_unitslpmax
survey.label: Units Large Pellets (Max container):
survey.hint: Custom fill. Maximum 24 units each Container

survey.name: ret_total_cost_perunit
survey.label: Total Cost Per Unit
survey.calculation: once(if(${ret_treatment}='Tri-pak',if(${ret_size}='mp' or ${ret_size}='mpmax',345,if(${ret_size}='rp' or ${ret_size}='rpmax',365,if(${ret_size}='lp' or ${ret_size}='lpmax',370,0))),if(${ret_treatment}='Tri-pak_45',if(${ret_size}='mp' or ${ret_size}='mpmax',364,if(${ret_size}='rp' or ${ret_size}='rpmax',384,if(${ret_size}='lp' or ${ret_size}='lpmax',389,0))),if(${ret_treatment}='Premium',if(${ret_size}='mp' or ${ret_size}='mpmax',379,if(${ret_size}='rp' or ${ret_size}='rpmax',399,if(${ret_size}='lp' or ${ret_size}='lpmax',404,0))),if(${ret_treatment}='Premium_45',if(${ret_size}='mp' or ${ret_size}='mpmax',398,if(${ret_size}='rp' or ${ret_size}='rpmax',418,if(${ret_size}='lp' or ${ret_size}='lpmax',423,0))),'')))))

survey.name: ret_lot_no
survey.label: Lot Number:
survey.hint: Enter lot number for this order

survey.name: ret_pails
survey.label: Number of Returned pails
survey.hint: # pails calculated based on size & units ordered.

survey.name: sub_total
survey.label: Original/Delivery Subtotal $
survey.hint: Without discounts applied.

survey.name: tot_pails_1
survey.label: Total pails after return
survey.calculation: if(${order} ='Order_2020' and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Delivery_2020')) or ${order} ='Delivery_2020' and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Delivery_2020')),${tot_pails},if(${order} ='Order_2020' and selected(${order_add},'Return_Delivery_2020') or ${order} ='Delivery_2020' and selected(${order_add},'Return_Delivery_2020'),${tot_pails}-${ret_tot_pails},0))

survey.name: tot_units_1
survey.label: Total units after return
survey.calculation: if(${order} ='Order_2020' and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Delivery_2020')) or ${order} ='Delivery_2020' and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Delivery_2020')),${tot_units},if(${order} ='Order_2020' and selected(${order_add},'Return_Delivery_2020') or ${order} ='Delivery_2020' and selected(${order_add},'Return_Delivery_2020'),${tot_units}-${ret_tot_units},0))

survey.name: sub_total_1
survey.label: Subtotal after return
survey.calculation: if(${order} ='Order_2020' and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Delivery_2020')) or ${order} ='Delivery_2020' and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Delivery_2020')),${sub_total},if(${order} ='Order_2020' and selected(${order_add},'Return_Delivery_2020') or ${order} ='Delivery_2020' and selected(${order_add},'Return_Delivery_2020'),${sub_total}-${ret_sub_total},0))

survey.name: earlypay
survey.label: Early Pay Discount
survey.hint: Eight percent if paid by Jan 10, 2020; Three percent if paid by May 1, 2020

survey.name: disc_note
survey.label: Early Pay discount does not apply to financed orders.

survey.name: earlypay_disc
survey.label: Early Pay Discount (Credit $)
survey.hint: Eight percent if paid by Jan 10, 2020; Three percent if paid by May 1, 2020

survey.name: ret_earlypay_subtotal
survey.label: Return Subtotal With Early Pay Discount $

survey.name: subtotal_orig-return
survey.label: Subtotal for original minus return
survey.calculation: if(${order} ='Order_2020' and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Delivery_2020')) or ${order} ='Delivery_2020' and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Delivery_2020')),round((${sub_total} - ${earlypay_disc}),2),if(${order} ='Order_2020' and selected(${order_add},'Return_Delivery_2020') or ${order} ='Delivery_2020' and selected(${order_add},'Return_Delivery_2020'),round((${sub_total} - ${earlypay_disc})-(${ret_sub_total}  + ${ret_earlypay_disc}),2),0))

survey.name: earlytot_due
survey.label: Total Due (If paid by selected discount date) $
survey.hint: Total due, assuming selected discount options.

survey.name: tot_due
survey.label: Total Due (with no discounts) $
survey.hint: Total due without discount options

survey.name: total_earlypay1
survey.label: Total Due (if paid by Jan. 10, 2020) $
survey.hint: for information only; 8 percent discount

survey.name: total_earlypay2
survey.label: Total Due (if paid by May 1, 2020) $
survey.hint: for information only; 3 percent discount

survey.name: amt_pd
survey.label: Amount Paid (Credit $)
survey.hint: Payment amount will apply to all order balances.

survey.name: credittot_due
survey.label: Customer Credit $
survey.hint: Total credit for returned seed

survey.name: earlybal_due
survey.label: Balance Due before selected Discount Date $

survey.name: bal_due
survey.label: Balance Due after May 1, 2020  $
survey.calculation: if(${order} ='Order_2020' and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Delivery_2020')) and ${amt_pd} != (${earlytot_due}-${credittot_due_calc}) or ${order} ='Delivery_2020' and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Delivery_2020')) and ${amt_pd} != (${earlytot_due}-${credittot_due_calc}),round(${tot_due} - ${amt_pd},2),if(${order} ='Order_2020' and selected(${order_add},'Return_Delivery_2020') and (${amt_pd}+${credittot_due_calc}) < ${tot_due} and (${amt_pd}+${credittot_due_calc}) !=${earlytot_due} or ${order} ='Delivery_2020' and selected(${order_add},'Return_Delivery_2020') and (${amt_pd}+${credittot_due_calc}) < ${tot_due} and (${amt_pd}+${credittot_due_calc}) !=${earlytot_due},round(${tot_due} - ${amt_pd} - ${credittot_due_calc},2),0))

survey.name: bal_due_calc
survey.label: Balance Due after Jan. 10  $
survey.calculation: if(${order} ='Order_2020' and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Delivery_2020')) and ${amt_pd} != (${earlytot_due}-${credittot_due_calc}) or ${order} ='Delivery_2020' and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Delivery_2020')) and ${amt_pd} != (${earlytot_due}-${credittot_due_calc}),round(${tot_due} - ${amt_pd},2),if(${order} ='Order_2020' and selected(${order_add},'Return_Delivery_2020') and (${amt_pd}+${credittot_due_calc}) < ${tot_due} and (${amt_pd}+${credittot_due_calc}) !=${earlytot_due} or ${order} ='Delivery_2020' and selected(${order_add},'Return_Delivery_2020') and (${amt_pd}+${credittot_due_calc}) < ${tot_due} and (${amt_pd}+${credittot_due_calc}) !=${earlytot_due},round(${tot_due} - ${amt_pd} - ${credittot_due_calc},2),0))

survey.label: Units Regular Pellets (Max Container):
survey.hint: Custom fill. Maximum 48 units each Container

survey.name: ret_rep_unitslpmax
survey.label: Units Large Pellets (Max container):
survey.hint: Custom fill. Maximum 24 units each Container

survey.name: ret_rep_price_unit_var
survey.label: Returned Price Per Unit for ${variety} $
survey.hint: This number can be edited.
survey.calculation: once(if(${ret_rep_treatment}='Tri-pak',if(${ret_rep_size}='mp' or ${ret_rep_size}='mpmax',345,if(${ret_rep_size}='rp' or ${ret_rep_size}='rpmax',365,if(${ret_rep_size}='lp' or ${ret_rep_size}='lpmax',370,0))),if(${ret_rep_treatment}='Tri-pak_45',if(${ret_rep_size}='mp' or ${ret_rep_size}='mpmax',364,if(${ret_rep_size}='rp' or ${ret_rep_size}='rpmax',384,if(${ret_rep_size}='lp' or ${ret_rep_size}='lpmax',389,0))),if(${ret_rep_treatment}='Premium',if(${ret_rep_size}='mp' or ${ret_rep_size}='mpmax',379,if(${ret_rep_size}='rp' or ${ret_rep_size}='rpmax',399,if(${ret_rep_size}='lp' or ${ret_rep_size}='lpmax',404,0))),if(${ret_rep_treatment}='Premium_45',if(${ret_rep_size}='mp' or ${ret_rep_size}='mpmax',398,if(${ret_rep_size}='rp' or ${ret_rep_size}='rpmax',418,if(${ret_rep_size}='lp' or ${ret_rep_size}='lpmax',423,0))),'')))))

survey.name: ret_rep_lot_no
survey.label: Lot Number:
survey.hint: Enter lot number for this order

survey.name: ret_rep_pails
survey.label: Number of Returned Pails
survey.hint: # pails calculated based on size & units ordered.

survey.name: rep_disc
survey.label: Replant Discount (Credit $)
survey.hint: 50% of List Price

survey.name: rep_credittot_due
survey.label: Customer Credit $
survey.hint: Total credit for returned seed

survey.name: rep_bal_due
survey.label: Replant Balance Due   $
survey.hint:
Includes Original/Delivery/Add'l Delivery Balance, Amount Paid
and any Credits, if applicable.

survey.name: tot_due_allcalc
survey.label: For summary
survey.calculation: if(not(selected(${order_add},'Add_Delivery_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Add_Delivery_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Replant_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Replant_2020')),${tot_due}-${credittot_due},if(selected(${order_add},'Add_Delivery_2020') and not(selected(${order_add},'Replant_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Replant_2020')) or selected(${order_add},'Return_Add_Delivery_2020') and not(selected(${order_add},'Replant_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Replant_2020')),${tot_due}-${credittot_due}+${add_tot_due}-${add_credittot_due},if(selected(${order_add},'Replant_2020') and not(selected(${order_add},'Add_Delivery_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Add_Delivery_2020')) or selected(${order_add},'Return_Replant_2020') and not(selected(${order_add},'Add_Delivery_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Add_Delivery_2020')),${tot_due}-${credittot_due}+${rep_tot_due}-${rep_credittot_due},${tot_due}-${credittot_due}+${add_tot_due}-${add_credittot_due}+${rep_tot_due}-${rep_credittot_due})))

survey.name: tot_credittot_allcalc
survey.label: For summary
survey.calculation: if(not(selected(${order_add},'Add_Delivery_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Add_Delivery_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Replant_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Replant_2020')),${credittot_due},if(selected(${order_add},'Add_Delivery_2020') and not(selected(${order_add},'Replant_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Replant_2020')) or selected(${order_add},'Return_Add_Delivery_2020') and not(selected(${order_add},'Replant_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Replant_2020')),${credittot_due}+${add_credittot_due},if(selected(${order_add},'Replant_2020') and not(selected(${order_add},'Add_Delivery_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Add_Delivery_2020')) or selected(${order_add},'Return_Replant_2020') and not(selected(${order_add},'Add_Delivery_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Add_Delivery_2020')),${credittot_due}+${rep_credittot_due},${credittot_due}+${add_credittot_due}+${rep_credittot_due})))

survey.name: earlybal_due_finalcalc
survey.label: For report - total balance with Early Pay
survey.calculation: if(not(selected(${order_add},'Replant_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Replant_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Add_Delivery_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Add_Delivery_2020')),${earlybal_due},if(selected(${order_add},'Add_Delivery_2020') and not(selected(${order_add},'Replant_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Replant_2020')) or selected(${order_add},'Return_Add_Delivery_2020') and not(selected(${order_add},'Replant_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Replant_2020')),${add_bal_due}-${earlypay_disc},${rep_bal_due}-${earlypay_disc}))

survey.name: bal_due_finalcalc
survey.label: For report - total balance after Early Pay
survey.calculation: if(not(selected(${order_add},'Replant_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Replant_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Add_Delivery_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Add_Delivery_2020')),${bal_due},if(selected(${order_add},'Add_Delivery_2020') and not(selected(${order_add},'Replant_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Replant_2020')) or selected(${order_add},'Return_Add_Delivery_2020') and not(selected(${order_add},'Replant_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Replant_2020')),${add_bal_due},${rep_bal_due}))

survey.name: amt_pd_all
survey.label: For report - total amount paid
survey.calculation: if(not(selected(${order_add},'Add_Delivery_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Add_Delivery_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Replant_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Replant_2020')),${amt_pd},if(selected(${order_add},'Add_Delivery_2020') and not(selected(${order_add},'Replant_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Replant_2020')) or selected(${order_add},'Return_Add_Delivery_2020')and not(selected(${order_add},'Replant_2020')) and not(selected(${order_add},'Return_Replant_2020')),${amt_pd}+${add_amt_pd},${amt_pd}+${add_amt_pd}+${rep_amt_pd}))

survey.name: replant_Sig
survey.label: Acknowledge Replant/Crop Loss
survey.hint:
I am asking for a replant discount to replace acres
planted this season that were damaged or lost. 
I understand I will need to submit a crop loss
report to my Holly Dealer. I hereby acknowledge
that I have read and completed the required 
documentation for a replant discount and that I 
meet the replant discount terms.

Early Pay discount does not apply to financed orders.
Check must be post marked by discount date  to qualify for Early Pay Discount

survey.name: ytotdueall

survey.name: form_complete
survey.label: Do you want this order to be emailed once it is submitted?
survey.hint:
Reminder for Strider App Users: 
Orders will not be emailed or saved to the Strider database until they have
been submitted through the "Send Forms In" section of the app.

survey.name: AUTO_EMAIL_TO
survey.label:
If you are editing a previously saved form, remember to check the
"Resend Emailed Report" box at the bottom of this page or the report won't be sent!

Enter any additional email recipients in the blank text box.
survey.hint:
Enter any additional email recipients
with a space between mutliple email addresses.
